author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the tag doclet so that the HTML documentation contained inside the javadoc comments comes out as XML so that it can be styled via XSLT, JSL, DVSL etc.

author: jstrachan
msg: Improved the javadoc to include some examples

author: jstrachan
msg: patched the XML and JSL tag library so that the <copy> tag works properly when creating declarative XSLT-like scripts in Jelly

author: jstrachan
msg: added a link to an example JellyUnit script

author: jstrachan
msg: changed the tag documentation generation to include a summary description at each library's section
